archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: IF-00853 Tuition Fees Transfer
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: TO BE interface to replace IF-00061 as part of the new SOA Hybrid Integration architecture required for the Student Journey Project. Will enable us to decouple from ISIS ahead of a new SIS (student information system) Note: Tuition fees which are raised in ISIS are sent to Agresso for raising invoices in Accounts Receivable in Agresso. This also includes any updates to the student master data.
